short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use the arrow keys or WASD on the keyboard or mobile touchscreen controls, or press SPACE to start.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use the arrow keys or WASD on the keyboard or mobile touchscreen controls, or press SPACE to start. Free game by moving to avoid the vehicles ahead, you are always in the lead you will win
